div.p: In a meat-eating world, wearing leather for shoes and clothes and even handbags, the discussion of fur is childish.

I would like to be a one-man multinational fashion phenomenon. In a meat-eating world, wearing leather for shoes and clothes and even handbags, the discussion of fur is childish. Don't dress to kill, dress to survive. I am never satisfied with myself and that is what keeps me going - I have no post-satisfaction. In a meat-eating world, wearing leather for shoes and clothes and even handbags, the discussion of fur is childish.

I have my permanent muses and my muses of the moment. In a meat-eating world, wearing leather for shoes and clothes and even handbags, the discussion of fur is childish. I am never satisfied with myself and that is what keeps me going - I have no post-satisfaction. You cannot be creative with people around you. In a meat-eating world, wearing leather for shoes and clothes and even handbags, the discussion of fur is childish.

What I hate is nasty, ugly people. You cannot be creative with people around you. Doing collections, doing fashion is like a non-stop dialogue. I am never satisfied with myself and that is what keeps me going - I have no post-satisfaction. You cannot be creative with people around you.

I am never satisfied with myself and that is what keeps me going - I have no post-satisfaction. In a meat-eating world, wearing leather for shoes and clothes and even handbags, the discussion of fur is childish. You cannot be creative with people around you. My job is to bring out in people what they wouldn't dare do themselves. I would like to be a one-man multinational fashion phenomenon.

I am never satisfied with myself and that is what keeps me going - I have no post-satisfaction. Doing collections, doing fashion is like a non-stop dialogue.

Don't dress to kill, dress to survive. You cannot be creative with people around you. My job is to bring out in people what they wouldn't dare do themselves. I would like to be a one-man multinational fashion phenomenon. Don't dress to kill, dress to survive.
